name: Black Works Studio - Rorschach - Petit Panatela
additionalNotes: The Black Works Studio Rorschach is a boutique, small batch cigar that packs a whole lot of strength and flavor into one small package. It starts with a savory Ecuadorian Habano wrapper and features aged Nicaraguan tobaccos for the binder and the filler. Notes of black pepper, nuts and dry oak help to create a smooth and creamy smoking experience.
